website_summaries.verdict: An attractive casual fleece jacket for running errands or day trips.
pros: Soft, medium-weight fabric makes this a pleasure to wear
Layers over and under other clothes well
Includes large zippered pockets that keep your belongings safe when you don’t want to bring a purse
cons: Those with a smaller chest may find it baggy on top
Some colors aren’t as they seem on the computer monitor

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! I was worried it'd be too bulky, short, or short arms based on reading reviews. But, I have been pleasantly surprised that it fit as I was hoping! I could have even managed a small, but with medium I can layer comfortably! Sea Salt is white FYI if anyone was trying to buy it. I was worried it would be a gray or off-white, but it is white! Which is exactly what I was wanting! I am 5'4 130lbs and medium fit loosely! I ordered 2, one Sea Salt and one Punch Pink.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Too small, cheap, and wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The color looks nothing like the picture depicts. I will attach a photo of the color I received. I ordered a 1X Plus size fleece. Normally I wear a regular large, or XL, but I decided to go bigger so I could layer it on a hoodie or something. This fleece is not a normal 1X size. It is very small and form fitting. I do not like the color, or the size, and it feels thin and cheap. You get what you pay for though.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this jacket. The way it fits is perfect. The material is great. The only problem is that I ordered it in black and it looks more like a faded black not like the picture at all. I wouldn’t suggest ordering in black unless you like the faded look. Other than that a great jacket
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Advertised As Petite But It Is Not
customer_reviews.text: This is not cut like a petite. I am 5’3” and have short arms that do not fit well in many articles of clothing with long sleeves that are not fitted for petite bodies. The jacket I ordered was labeled as “petite. The sleeves cover all of my arms and most of my fingers, with just my middle finger on each hand only slightly uncovered. It is too thick to look attractive and to feel comfortable bunched-up above my wrist. The material is soft and the zippers seem to work well. Delivery was timely. Will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Langston

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Just a touch smaller than expected but overall great. Super warm and a AWESOME price! This is so soft against the skin.. will be buying another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ali B.

customer_reviews.title: COLORS ARE NOT EVEN CLOSE!
customer_reviews.text: I order this jacket in navy. The color wasn't even close! It was more like a blue/gray color. I called and asked for a pre-paid return label because the color was not as advertised. I was told to send a picture which I did and that it was a monitor calibration problem. Really? I have provided a picture. you decide!
customer_reviews.author: Betty2

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Columbia Fleece Jackets are great to wear in the Spring and the Fall. Good for layering in the Winter too. The fleece is a good weight and soft. The jacket has two zip pockets with elastic in the sleeves and a draw string around the bottom. I'm 5' 10" and the sleeve length was fine on me. The jacket does have a slim fit which I find flattering. The jacket washes up nice too. Great value on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: the anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Good for everything
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these and taking them to places I live outside the US. They are a transitional jacket in autumn, an extra layer of warmth in winter and handy for crisp mornings before they day warms up. They are light and wash easily, although they need to be washed cold and put in the dryer at low heat just long enough to fluff them up before hanging. When they eventually wear a little thin, I keep one near the bed to slip on when nights get a little too cold for comfort but not enough to turn on the heating. I find them the perfect take along for flights and convenient for gardening and housework.
customer_reviews.author: jlockley

customer_reviews.title: I purchased three of these, I don't recommend buying, not sure what happened to the quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these fleeces to replace my Columbia fleece from last year; two navy and one black. The colors are not as pictured. The two navy fleeces arrived and were light blue. All three fleeces including the black were faded and weren't the same quality of fabric from those I purchased last year by Columbia. I don't recommend buying these fleece coats, not sure what happened to the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong color and it looks fake?
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing bad reviews.. but this is my second purchase. I loved my first fleece and it looked exactly like the picture. I ordered an XL black and what I got was a gray colored fleece. It seems a lot thinner than my last one and the “Columbia” embroidered looks different from the picture shown. It looks sewn on, but the tags all say Columbia so maybe I’m just paranoid. I’m not sure if it’s because it’s a knock off or what. See picture. It fits as expected and it’s cute.. but I really wanted the black since I already have gray. Sorry but I had to give this 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cold office
customer_reviews.text: My work office is always too cold for me so I was looking for a warm zip-up fleece with pockets. This fit the bill perfectly and was on sale. It is very soft and comfortable and looks decent in a business casual office. As other reviews have noted, the black is a bit faded. I had originally ordered a small, but it was tight when I zipped it up, so I repurchased a medium. It fits perfectly, although the sleeves are a little long. Only complaint I have is that the material inside the pockets is a bit harsh on hands (almost like a microfiber material), but I won't be using the pockets much so it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfy, Fits as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sweatshirt. It's warm and comfy, and gives plenty of room for me to comfortably wear another long-sleeved shirt underneath. The size was perfect; I ordered a medium and it fit just as I had hoped. It's VETY white though, so I live my life in fear whenever I wear it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in Picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a jacket which should have had the logo embroidered on the chest. Instead, the one I received had an iron-on patch, with stitching around it. Unfortunately, I will be returning the item. I previously had one and loved it, it's a nice weight and provides substantial warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely feels and looks like a counterfeit jacket. The jacket I received was a thinner quality compared to my other columbia jackets that I have purchased. It also came with a different color logo, a black and white sew on tag (and not stitched into the jacket like the exact one I was replacing). Even the tightener at the bottom of the jacket was super small compared to my other jackets as well. Very disappointed and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket but Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I saw how small my Amazon box was I knew something must be wrong. Sure enough, when I took the jacket out, I couldn't believe the difference in quality from my other Columbia jacket that is now about 5 yrs. old. The fleece is so light and almost see-through thin. It is a pretty jacket to be sure, and I love the deep blue color, but be aware that Columbia products are not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs MASSIVE and doesn’t keep you warm.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’4 and 115 lbs so I wear an XS or S. I bought this jacket in an XS and the middle/chest is the size of a medium while the sleeves are the size of a large. It’s MASSIVE and also very boxy for a women’s jacket. Definitely not happy with purchase. I was trying to save money but will go back to North Face since their jackets are tight and properly shaped for a woman’s body. This jacket also is very thin and won’t keep you warm in the winter unless you’ve got 3-4 layers on underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight fleece jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love Benton Springs fleece jackets; they last for years and wash/dry easily. However, Columbia Navy is a very light navy, more of a dusty, smoky blue. (On my monitor, it appears this way, too.) I ended up later ordering the Fast Track Columbia jacket in Ebony Blue, which was more of the navy I wanted. Color aside, though, I like the Benton Springs jacket a bit more than the Fast Track, mainly because it's less fitted than the Fast Track. I'm size 16 and Columbia size XL always works best for me, leaving room to layer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: It’s thick, plush, and has inside pockets! 💕
customer_reviews.text: I recently left a job which had a similar jacket with the prior employer’s logo. Since I am now working for a competitor I needed something to keep me warm in an office setting. This fit the bill exactly. The thing I liked about the other jacket was the inside pockets. This one has them too. And I LOVE that. I put things in the inside pockets I want to make sure I don’t lose like the key fob or cash— no falling out of the outter pockets. It is thick and plush. I thought a good value for the price. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: CMRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Not made for tall heavy women
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I should have listened to my gut and never ordered this sweater. I’m a very tall, 5’11, large 280 woman. My torso is extremly long and this sweater was way to short. The sleeves were also almost too short. I would not purchase again. Obviously I should have known since women aren’t supposed to be tall or heavy. Returned and refunded quickly. That’s the reason for two stars.
customer_reviews.author: ANB

customer_reviews.title: Not for long people
customer_reviews.text: I have a Columbia fleece jacket from several years ago that I love and have been trying unsuccessfully to find more that fit like it in other colors. That one is a size medium, it's kind of loose overall, but it's comfy and works well over sweaters and other layers. This one doesn't fit anything like it. It's tight across the bust & underarms and the sleeves are too short. I'm 5'7", C cup, kind of athletic shouldered & have trouble finding tops and jackets that don't have that issue. In general, I find Columbia's clothes aren't designed for longer gals. Their clothes are cut shorter and kind of boxy. Not very flattering on my frame.
customer_reviews.author: SS7

customer_reviews.title: weirdly long sleeves
customer_reviews.text: This jacket has a flattering cut for the torso, but the sleeves are so long that it ruins the look. (I'm only 5'4" but the model in the photo is surely taller and you can see the issue there.) I've found that many Columbia items have unusually long sleeves, but I can live with it. Here the elastic at the wrist makes things worse because it causes the sleeves to bunch up. I loved the fit otherwise and the color, but I'm returning because I'd otherwise need to have the sleeves shortened.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred

customer_reviews.title: The colors you receive is not the same as the color on the website
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket in black. I received the jacket and it was not black. It was Heather Grey. I returned the jacket for a larger size and black was not available. So I ordered the larger size in Navy. The jacket is not Navy. It is a light blue color. The pictures make it look more grey but I think we can agree its not Navy.
customer_reviews.author: Zarita N Gant

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Small blue/teal fleece Jacket. The attachable tag on the jacket said Small, the Tag n the jacket said X Large. The jacket was NOT NEW ! it was soiled, stained with food at the front and we could clearly see that it had been worn ! Blonde hair were on it, I'm dark brown ! The sleeves were showing that it was worn before like someone had rolled up their sleeves ! Honestly, what a disappointment, I sent it back 2 hours later. Don't waste your time and money. Beatrice
customer_reviews.author: Michael Natale

customer_reviews.title: I love this fleece
customer_reviews.text: I love this fleece! You can’t beat this price for a Columbia! It’s super warm and fits me great! I was worried it wasn’t going to zip over my chest but it did and I’m a 32DDD and I weigh 145 pounds and I’m 5"7' I got a small.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this fleece
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to read positive reviews from other petite women like me! I was looking for a lightweight, warm fleece (with a roomy fit for more layers underneath) to wear under my rain-resistant shell. I’m 5’2 and purchased size small in dark grey. The sleeves go slightly past my palm and the bottom of the jacket to just below my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Adele907

customer_reviews.title: Black is really dark gray, Runs a little large.
customer_reviews.text: Have a couple of these jackets just to wear around the office... They're thick enough to keep warm but also nice enough appearance-wise to wear into most meetings. I'm 5'3" and 125lbs. and I ordered the black, size XS. It fits me a little loosely. Sleeves, waist, and chest are all slightly baggy, even with the smallest size. The "black" is actually more of a really dark gray, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: The color is not a true black
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the picture showed dark black but I just received it and it the tags weren't attached I would swear it has been worn for a long time by someone else. It is so faded like it is a charcoal instead of black. Now I get to waste my time, energy, and money sending it back or just throw it in the bottom of the closet. It would be so better if it was the color it was advertised as. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Moore

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Lives up to the columbia name as far as the quality of what the product claims to be. I ordered a petite large because I wanted the fit to be a bit baggy. Im 5'1 135 pounds and this fit great. I haven't tried it in cold weather or washed and dried it yet. I also purchased the mens version on the actual columbia website and it is the exact same quality/fabric with the stitched on logo. I had seen some disclaimers about this being a possible fake brand but the one I received seems to be authentic. Columbia's website also carrys this exact same fleece on their website as well, overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Emily hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars but only one complaint...
customer_reviews.text: I love the jacket and I ordered it because I already have one that is starting to look worn. The only complaint I have is that the one I already own is a size small and fits perfectly. So I ordered another small. It was a bit too snug so I had to swap it for a medium. So over the years the size or fit has changed. The medium fits more comfortably but the sleeves are a tad long.
customer_reviews.author: Jonie L. Neese

customer_reviews.title: WARM!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Iceland to layer over a thermal long sleeve and under a rain jacket and it was perfect! As a native South Floridian, I was definitely not made for 50°F and below temps but this kept me so warm, I even used it over a regular t-shirt for my airport outfit home and it wasn’t super hot!
customer_reviews.author: Alli J

customer_reviews.title: broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: I really love the size, color, and warmth of this fleece, however I have had it for a week and the zipper line comes undone every time I zip it up. I cannot find the person to contact to get a replacement but now I am unable to unzip it without strain and am not as warm. I will definitely leave higher stars if I am provided a replacement or a refund to re-order a new one in working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket! I was so glad to find it in a petite size. I'm almost 5'3 and the sleeve length is perfect. I got the dark heather gray and it's very pretty. It also seems very well constructed and the fleece is lightweight but warm. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: lolacat

customer_reviews.title: Good jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6 and 130 lbs and the medium fits perfectly. It's fitted but not snug or very thick so I can easily wear a shirt underneath without looking bulky. The sleeves are long, which I like but they have an elastic end so they won't slide down over your hand if you don't want them to. I ordered this in the Columbia Navy and the color was true to the picture. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the texture of the material. I'm not sure how to describe it other than odd. I wouldn't like it on my bare skin but it's fine over a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: quippers

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Go with your normal size if you’re tall! Normally I have to size up in jackets since I’m 6’0 tall and have long arms with broad shoulders, but other reviewers mentioned that this jacket has longer sleeves. So I went with my normal size (L). It fits perfectly! There is room in all the right places, it is long enough (hits me at the hips, sleeves hit at the wrists), and is definitely warm enough. I’m excited to wear this in the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Alise W

customer_reviews.title: OK Jacket, It's cheap so you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket enough that I won't return it. The sleeves are extra long, which is a bonus. The body part is short though. It hits barely at the waist. The jacket has no liner (it says liner in the product description). It's a nice early Fall or Spring jacket. I bought a 3X and it fits more like a 1X. The fabric is super soft and I'll update my review as time passes and I wear it more. My last Columbia jacket lasted 10 years before the zipper broke. Wondering how long this will.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye 2010

customer_reviews.title: Warm jacket; black color is actually dark gray
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and very warm. Not too bulky and can easily wear under a raincoat as an extra layer. I like that the collar is high enough that it protects the entire neck when fully zipped up. The only complaint: I bought the jacket in Black but the color is more like a dark gray/slate. I would much prefer black but the dark gray was good enough.
customer_reviews.author: nicone

customer_reviews.title: Dont get the black
customer_reviews.text: The black is NOT true to black.. its really weird. It looks like a faded black/almost charcoal color but apparently this is normal because I went to their store the other day and all of the other black fleece jackets of this style were the same weird shade. I wanted to wear this as my go to black fleece jacket but if its not black than I guess I'd have to return and keep searching for one. Overall, the fit is a bit baggy but its a nice casual look. The sleeves are elastic which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie5ever

customer_reviews.title: Runs A Bit Large
customer_reviews.text: First thing, I'd say these jackets run rather large. I initially got a petite small but it was far too large for me (5'3", 125 lbs for reference). The regular extra small fits much better, although it still has a kind of strange shapelessness to it. Certainly not the most figure-flattering item of clothing but I suppose that's not what I got it for. I'm also not a huge fan of sleeves that end in elastic, but it's not a deal breaker. Overall, it's a comfortable light weight jacket and for the price I'm perfectly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JackNikon

customer_reviews.title: Jacket comes to your hip
customer_reviews.text: If you’re tall and looking for something to cover your booty, this is not it. However, I love this jacket, it’s warm and soft and is perfect for cool fall or spring days. I just wish the jacket was longer length wise. It fits just at my hip, and I was hoping it would have covered a bit more of my you-know-what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket I've ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this jacket !!! My friend gave me one as a Christmas present like six years ago, and I literally live in this jacket! It's warm but breathes when it starts to get warm out. And repels food spills like hot sauce, spaghetti sauce etc. The color hides all dirtiness. I only wash it like twice a year. It doesn't pill, doesn't shrink. I loaned mine to my daughter one day because she forgot her jacket and she loved it so much I bought her one of her own. And I love that the pockets zip up. Your stuff won't fall out. I can't say enough about this jacket. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki  Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: It’s soooooo comfy! I’m 5’4” tall, 125-127lbs, 32B, 27” waist, and typically a size 4. I purchase the citrus grey in a size Small- and I love it! The sleeves are a perfect length, not too long, not too short. It doesn’t have the embroidered logo, it’s a sewn on patch instead; a little bummed that it’s not completely as advertised. Nice and soft and warm. Initially purchased for layering for a ski trip I have next year but I will most likely be wearing this during the cooler months! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BootyJunk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I got the petite. It fits like it should for my height. It’s not bulky at all. It’s fitted but not tight. Exactly what I wanted for a woman’s fleece jacket. I love the color too. Although it’s not black, grey or even a true navy, it’s still a neutral color that goes well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Z. D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, cute and practical jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! I've got it in light grey color and it looks just as a picture. I love how it keeps my neck warm and fitted sleeves keep warms in. It's very soft an cozy but doesn't look sloppy. I wear it around the house, to layer up under the rain jacket, for everyday errands, for business casual occasions- it's very practical and versatile. I'm size medium on a top and large on a bottom. I've got it in size medium and it fits just right, not too loose on top of too tight on a bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit but the color is off
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect light-weight jacket. The sleeves are long enough to ride comfortably at the wrists for my long arms. My only complaint is that the colors of the Columbia jackets are off. I bought the navy color first and it wasn't navy; it was like a faded denim. I returned it and bought the black, but it is not a true black; it is more like a charcoal grey. If the color is important to you, this coat may be disappointing; otherwise it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: loves2laugh

customer_reviews.title: Great car jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is well made...the perfect car jacket. The zipper is the right size and well sewn. I love the design as it fits my shoulder perfectly. In addition, the length of the sleeves are perfect for me. The sleeve length is important because so many jackets have the sleeves too long, so they compensate by making the elastic tighter in the wrist. I'm a little bigger in the bust, so the chest is a little snog. However, I will say that the style and cut are very comfortable. The jacket is price well and I highly recommend this jacket,
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M. Middendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a great deal on Amazon, I think I wouldn’t have got it as cheap even at the Columbia outlet. I love the color and it arrived in great shape as well. I have several other Columbia fleece jackets, so I knew how the sizes fit. I ordered a large since I wanted a roomier fit, the medium is a more fitted look on me. If they have it on a great sale again, I’ll definitely be ordering more. These are great to take with me to work or when I need a light jacket on cooler days.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grammo

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, fabric is icky.
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 identical Columbia jackets just like this. This fabric felt icky out of the bag. Poor quality fabric. Not soft, not snuggly, felt super plastic-y. These always fit on the small side so I ordered an XXL. I'm 5'9" and size 18. Loved that the sleeves were longer (I have long arms and figured the 1X would have shorter sleeves). It is very bulky under the arms and at the cuffs with the elastic, I felt like a blue snowman it was so bulky. I don't like it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: weird fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket in a 3X because it was on sale. The torso is rather short compared to the jacket in the pictures, and the arms are rather long. It’s very disproportionate. I’m 5’6” and busty. I have long arms, the sleeves are too long on me, But they do have elastic, I wish it was longer though and covered my butt. I decided to keep it because it’s a great weight, color, and mostly because of the price
customer_reviews.author: J**A*

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising! Fake Patch Logo!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cirrus grey in medium. The logo on the product photo is clearly embroidered. I received an item that seems fake because of a patch only logo. The jacket is soft but very thin fleece not suitable for very cold weather. The color shown is almost a blue grey and my jacket is clearly light grey. I would say that the seller is not consistent with their product which seems very sketchy. If you like to be surprised with items you buy go for it! I would not recommend this due to the inconsistency with advertising and actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Columbia fleece jacket, warm even on a 35° day.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Columbia fleece(dark Heather grey). I'm 5'2", 34DD, 137lbs and I ordered this in a Large. I can overlap by a few inches, but I wanted it a lil big, perfect fit, it is warm even on a 35° day. it does say in description that this could come embroidered or a Columbia patch and mine came with the Columbia patch I would have rather had the embroidery, the patch looks cheap but oh well and this fleece jacket does come with an authentic Columbia TAG w/a $60 price on it. I bought My daughter one Also in the sky blue, really pretty color, And hers came embroidered.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Veasey

customer_reviews.title: DONT.. JUST DONT...
customer_reviews.text: NOT COLUMBIA!! FAAKKEEEEE!i have multiple others so when I received this and saw the name as a stitched on patch not embroidered into the jacket and another brands logo or whatever on the zippers I taped the box back up and shipped it back. Everything else seemed legit. But 🤷🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, beautiful fleece jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Columbia full-zip fleece jacket for a new friend. She really likes it and it fits her perfectly. I saw her yesterday when we met for lunch, and she was wearing it. She looked stunning in it. The color I chose was "Aquarium" -- a fairly bright light green or greenish-aqua. I own 9 or 10 Columbia fleece jackets myself and live in them during the winter and most of autumn and spring, so obviously I think very highly of them. I guessed that my friend would appreciate one as a gift, and I was right.
customer_reviews.author: David Vincent

customer_reviews.title: A wardrobe staple!
customer_reviews.text: I have several Columbia fleece jackets. I wear them to work year round because it's always cold in the office I work at. I'm 5' 2" and 130 pounds and the medium fits well with room to wear a sweater under it in the winter. I wash my fleece jackets inside out in cold water and line dry them. I can usually get about two years worth of use out of them by doing this.
customer_reviews.author: PomMom66

customer_reviews.title: Want in many colors
customer_reviews.text: I have many of these sweaters. I find them comfortable to wear over a tank or short-sleeved t-shirt for cool weather whether I am exercising outdoors, running errands, or just spending time indoors. I like the new sewn on brand patch (compared to the older style that was embroidered) on the chest because it was easy to remove and didn’t leave a permanent mark in the fleece. I have several blue colors, but none is exactly the (TARDIS) blue I’m looking for. Overall I find the color limited both in range and availability.
customer_reviews.author: memery

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this jacket. Bought last winter as a layering piece for a trip to the east coast and I couldn’t be happier. Was perfect outer for the plane and not too hot for under my overcoat. And it’s not an unflattering fit. Can’t say it’s necessarily cute, but I still love it and where all the time. Like right now. I am wearing it right now.
customer_reviews.author: swilliams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for the inbetween seasons, spring and fall. This is perfect for that! It's comfortable and cozy. It's warm but not overly so, similar to a fleece lined hoodie. I would say for my plus sized ladies the length my be shorter that you like. I am an a sz 18, the 2x for perfect with a little room, but it fell between my belly button and hip. Which for me I wear a lot of undershirts and tunics so it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Shutt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I like the color (pastel green) and the fit (L). The fit is slightly oversized but still shaped. The sleeves might be a tad long for some people but the cuff stays in place and doesn't sag down. For me, it allows a bulkier shirt under it for winter. Washes up well - no shedding during drying, no shrinking. Soft. The adjustable string at the hem is a nice plus, along with the zippered pockets. This was my second one because I liked the first one a lot. The weight is perfect for mild winters (above 30F).
customer_reviews.author: Reading Fool

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever made!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old stepdaughter asked for this jacket for her birthday and she has not taken it off since she got it, several months ago. She even worse it brought a Texas summer! This is the absolute best bang for our buck we have ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great plus size option
customer_reviews.text: Fits just like my other Columbia outerwear. For reference, I’m a size 22/24 with small chest and very wide hips and a 3x can zip up with some wiggle room so it’s not too snug even on the hips. I love that the length is a bit longer to cover my waist and even when sitting/bending and I’m not tugging at the hem. Sleeves are also plenty long enough which is huge for me as most women’s long sleeves are more like 3/4 sleeves on my arms. Upper arms are roomy as well if that’s a concern. It’s a bit thicker fleece than I expected but super soft and a great all around mid weight jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mistelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Europe and it was just what I needed. Got it in black and "sea salt" white. I'm a size 14 in jeans, 38B, size L/XL in tops/dresses. The size Large fit great for me. I tend to carry my weight in my stomach and this was still comfortable and flattering. The outside pockets zip closed which was good for pickpocketing plus there are inside pockets. The sleeves are just slightly too long but I didn't mind it. Very breathable material, never felt too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the olive green jacket on the Columbia website & used the chat because the color looked more brown then olive, so the nice person sent me the link for Amazon to purchase last years colors & told me it was more green. It was the color I was looking for at a great price. I love these to wear to work, they are warm outside but they don't get too hot if I leave them on while at work!! Nice not to have to find a place to leave my jacket & then remember to get it before I leave!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and cuddly, well made, attractive, and I like it. I bought it in the light gray which looks silver, which is attractive, and I found a velour hat trimmed in silver thread that picks up the color of the jacket. Good zipper, nice pockets big enough to warm my hands in. Columbia is a brand one can trust, and this is a first-quality Columbia garment that lists for $60 on the Columbia website. The tag also lists the price as $60.
customer_reviews.author: Listening Woman

customer_reviews.title: sleeves too long
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5ft. 2in., 107 lbs. I got the petite medium. The sleeve length was almost to my fingertips. The width of the arms was too large and the length was too long. The fabric was nice. I had to return. I didn't exchange for the petite small. The cut was too bulky and not flattering.
customer_reviews.author: adele

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it in black but it isn’t a true black, it is more of a dark charcoal or grey. I am fairly tall and have longer arms but the jacket arms barely reach my upper wrist/lower forearm. I work at the hospital and I am constantly washing my hands so it doesn’t bother me too much because the jacket never gets in the way or gets wet at the wrists but if you’re looking for a longer fit, definitely size up. It is very warm and soft but not incredibly flattering. I definitely chose this jacket for its function not fashion.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: super warm, soft, and cozy! does shrink in dryer
customer_reviews.text: i'm a big fan of this jacket so far! haven't washed it yet so not sure if it will shrink. but it fits nicely, allows me to wear a sweater under it, and is very warm. i am 5'5", 135lbs, 34DDD and a small fits perfectly. edited my review and took off a star because it does shrink when washed and dried. i would recommend ordering a size up
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not what is shown on line
customer_reviews.text: I just returned this item because the design and color is different compared to what was advertised on line. 1) The sleeves are long and have a cut out for the thumb and rather being a straight fit with elastic at the bottom 2) The bottom of the jacket is curved like a shirt and not straight cut 3) The color was much lighter compared to what I saw on line These were issues to me and may not be issues to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cicone

customer_reviews.title: Size down for a more fitted style
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews, I decided to size down and boy am I glad I did. It fit perfectly. I’m normally a size small and wanted a more fitted sweater so wind doesn’t travel up the sleeves, I’m sure it still will, but the fit is much more comfortable (not too loose, so it’s not like a home sweater). The jacket is still loose enough to wear long sleeves or a thin jacket underneath. Had it on for 5 minutes and it’s really warming me up! Great find, especially for the price (1/8th of other name brand jackets).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T Kim

customer_reviews.title: and for that it definitely works great! It is cozy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as just a house jacket to wear when I got cold gaming, and for that it definitely works great! It is cozy, warm and the color is fantastic. It is a bit brighter than the picture shows, but I like it better. It kind of glows! I ordered the medium because I wanted it to be oversized on me, and it definitely is. I am 5'6" and 135lbs with a larger chest. It zips up with plenty of room all over, maybe even too much. I am definitely ordering another one, but I think this time it will be in small so it doesn't feel so oversized. Received on time and perfectly wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Battlekitti

customer_reviews.title: Not a true Navy as expected. Looks faded and trashy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to wear at work with my scrubs that are navy since we can only wear things with minimum logos. I have other Colombia jackets/ sweaters that I love, but was unable to find a navy one in store. Based off the picture it looked like a true dark navy, but I was disappointed when it came in that it definitely not true navy. It looks faded and cheap! It is more like a slate navy, or is where it almost looks sun faded. It does not match any of my navy scrubs. It’s comfortable and warm, but I can’t look faded and unmatched at work. Disappointed to spend $40 on a sweater that looks like trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cantara

customer_reviews.title: love this fleece
customer_reviews.text: I love this fleece and wear it for traveling, hiking, cold weather, around the house, etc. it's perfect. I love columbia hiking stuff and I have their jacket too. I wear this fleece under the light weight jacket for hiking so I can layer and take items on and off as the weather changes or my temp changes. so far this fleece has been durable and held up to many washes. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fleece jacket for cooler days/nights
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Fleece Jacket. I am 5'1 about 115lbs and the XS fit perfectly (see pic) You can comfortably wear a long sleeve shirt and still have enough wiggle room. I got the white and it's nice...just make sure you're not eating pasta with marinara sauce the day you are wearing it 😉 or take it off. It also has a functional inside pocket! (See pic)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: As a huge fan of Columbia I am somewhat disappointed by this fleece. Its soft enough. Not "omg so soft" but not rough or anything. It fits on the large side and the cut isn't fitted but more poofy. I think what I'm most let down by is how thin it is. Its warm enough but not what I was expecting from a Columbia midlayer. It's on sale for 30$ which is okay but I would be upset if I played the full 60. I will say the color is nice so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: darthkitsu

customer_reviews.title: Sad to see it go
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color but seems it runs just a bit large which may suit some folks. Sleeves very long and just a little larger than expected everywhere. Couldn't return because I washed it hoping would shrink up just a little but didn't work. Still love the color and have a granddaughter it will fit just great.
customer_reviews.author: rnbranch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is not navy, it is more of a medium dusty blue. The color is pretty and the fit is perfect, including sleeve length. I bought an XL. I am 5'9" and 41" at the chest. The jacket sits right the hip line on me. I went with Columbia because I wanted a well made jacket and they did not disappoint! Fabric is soft and substantial. Excellent for sitting on the deck on a chilly night!
customer_reviews.author: sciencegal

customer_reviews.title: comfy, good for long arms
customer_reviews.text: Love the material, very soft. I got the black and it does look slightly faded but I don't mind. Wish it had a bit more of a flattering shape to it, instead it's very "square-ish." My favorite is the sleeves. I am 5'10, 155lbs with long arms and it's difficult to find sleeves that are long enough. These fit me perfect so they might be a bit too long for the average size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy in multiple colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket about a month ago for the first time in a light blue/green color called Spray. I liked it so much that I decided to purchase a second jacket in black. Both jackets fit as expected. I wear a size 8 and ordered a medium. The jacket is warm and has a flattering cut. It also holds up well to washing, did not dry because I never dry fleece materials. I highly recommend this jacket, its perfect for cool days & nights or even when your husband decides to run the AC wide open.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this fleece
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this fleece. It isn't "boxy" like some, it is nicely fitted and looks great. It is just a touch smaller than I would have thought a medium would be. I was toying with getting a small and glad I didn't. I did not check of "somewhat small" as it was just barely smaller than expected. The length is good so wind can't blow up your back. None of the other colors were very interesting which is why I got black. I would recomend this fleece, nicer looking than others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Yodagirl

customer_reviews.title: Ordering problem.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine,in point of fact I ordered a second color. The problem with ordering is another issue. I put in size then color,when I clicked on order a message said you must enter size. I tried several times with no success. I called amazon to order. I order quite a bit on line,your website is the only one that I encounters this problem. Again a very fine garment.
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLAS A. DE LUCA

customer_reviews.title: Wear these all the time!
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm and soft so I bought them in three colors. Black, dark grey and blue. I can cinch the waists which is nice and a draft won’t come it and it’s not too long then. It’s roomy so I can layer if I need to. For the price, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket; black is actually dark gray
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this! She wears it all the time. Having a columbia jacket myself, I can understand why she likes it so much. However, like previous reviewers have mentioned, the jacket in the color "black" is not truly black, but rather a charcoal grey. It doesn't seem to bother my daughter, though. Overall, it's a great jacket and I'm going to buy another color for her in the near future! Sizing: My daughter ordered an XS. She is around 5 feet, and weighs 109 pounds. It fits her well. Not tight, not loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kashif M Rana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cosy!

Get this one ladies, and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Black kat 1

customer_reviews.title: Get these while you can!

Only this time, I was able to purchas a Petite Medium so that I would have ample room for as many layers as I need. Definitely a fine purchase!! I even selected the same exact color. And it's extremely well made! 5 stars, even 6.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Urbanske

Not super expensive but not cheap either. Columbia brand has a good reputation though.
customer_reviews.author: Pia & mama

customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large or extra large depending on brand and fit. I ordered an extra large in this and it fits perfect, my only complaint is the sleeves are a bit long but I don’t mind cuffing them. I didn’t order petite and I’m glad I didn’t as the jacket length was mid hip with the regular fit. I ordered the dark grey and it is beautiful and the material is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Not the same Columbia Sportswear quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same jacket last year and I love it. Wanted it in another color but the material is not as pictured. It is much thinner and looks cheap. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: APkobl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got one in another color while on vacation but also wanted one in a more neutral color. The only slight negative is that although it’s supposed to be black, it looks a little bit like dark charcoal in color. Otherwise, I like that it has zippered pockets and it’s very warm. customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the warmth for such a light weight jacket.

If you are looking for light weight, comfortable and actually something that keeps the cold out, look no further. Thanks Columbia for another great product!

customer_reviews.title: Quality jacket

customer_reviews.author: McLulu

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket
product_meta.description:
There's nothing more necessary than a fleece layer in a women's outdoor winter wardrobe—that's why the Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket exists. Columbia's soft, winter-ready jacket is the ultimate warmth provider and the everyday style piece.

Crafted of our super-soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece, this Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket is the perfect layering piece and first line of defense to combat the cold. It contains a modern classic fit that allows for comfortable movement and zippered side pockets to keep your small items (including your hands) secure. An added bonus is the warm collar that's flexible so you can choose whether you want to wear it up or down, depending on your desired level of toastiness.

Our Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece Jacket is available in many accommodating sizes and colors as well. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
feature_bullets: SOFT FABRIC: This Columbia Women's Benton Springs Full Zip fleece is crafted of soft 100% polyester MTR filament fleece for ultimate warmth.
HANDY FEATURES: This Columbia women's fleece jacket features two side zippered security pockets to keep your small items secure.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: With a collared neck and zippered closure, this Columbia women's fleece jacket is designed to give you ultimate comfort during cold winter days.
CLASSIC FIT: With a modern classic fit, Columbia's Benton Springs Full Zip Fleece is lightweight with an active cut for comfortable outdoor activity.
COLD-WEATHER ESSENTIAL: A full-zip closure and unbelievably soft fleece make this jacket an essential for cold weather.
